Done-For-You Marketing is a service for business owners who do not have time to manage their online presence and marketing. We are here to do it for you! We will manage your social media accounts, website and provide high quality posts to keep your business presence growing.

We are a family friendly movie theater that provides entertainment at affordable prices.  We have eight locations located across the country.  We proudly provide a bright atmosphere, fresh popcorn and smiling engaging employees to enhance your experience.  We strive to have a culture that is centered on the development and encouragement of our young employees (first jobs for many) so that our guests are cared for by amazing staff that support each other and understand that essence of Share the Experience.We also strive to provide exceptional value to our guests by providing the latest in movie projection, sound and seating technology while providing admission and concession prices that are typically the lowest in the market.  We want families to be able to Share the Experience of Hollywood’s amazing productions, all together and more often, without breaking their budget.  All of our theaters are entirely digital surround sound and projection with 3D capability.  And, each location has affordable concession prices with $1 hot dogs and popcorn combos that can fit any budget.As a General Manager, I provide leadership and vision to the organization.  Some responsibilities include; employee training and development, policy documentation and development, and to insure accurate documentation of production and quality control data and records.
7135 E. Camelback Road, Suite 205 Scottsdale, Arizona 85251

Launched in 2001, Medix was built on the principle of becoming a leading provider of workforce solutions for clients and candidates across the Healthcare, Scientific and Information Technology industries. As we grow and evolve, we recognize our differentiation lies not just in traditional staffing, but in true partnerships and collaboration on hiring solutions. At Medix Care Management, I specialize in communicating with healthcare professionals across the nation to assist in their job search and connect them with our partners in the industry. If you are a healthcare professional and are currently looking for a new opportunity in your area, please contact me at SBretheim@MedixTeam.com.About Medix:Opportunity mismatches and ambiguity threaten your ability to secure meaningful work and significantly impact lives. Medix Care Management eliminates your uncertainty by matching you to opportunities that fulfill your needs and values, so you can exceed goals for personal success while making a difference. Medix partners with health plans, hospitals and other healthcare organizations to develop a proactive, customized recruitment strategy that will create a long-term sustainable workforce.Specialties: medical management: case management, utilization review/management, quality management, prior authorization, disease management, social work, HEDIS, LPN, RN, NP, FNP, PA, etc.

summary: My name is Samantha Bretheim. I have had great experiences in my past with traveling, volunteering and working. I have also had the luxury of traveling the world for BMX racing. I was fortunate enough to be one of few women in the USA chosen to go to the 2005 World Championship BMX race in Brazil. After graduating with my professional writing degree from the University of Minnesota Duluth, I am now applying my skills and growing them through my new business Done-For-You Marketing. I continue to grow and learn everyday to support my clients in the best way possible.
